title: Mushroom (mountain troll)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mushroom is a sleeping Mountain troll found just near the entrance to the Troll Stronghold. He currently seems to have no use in the game. There is a treasure trail clue which leads to coordinates just next to this troll. The player can hear a snoring sound if they stand near Mushroom.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mushroom (NPC)
This article is about the troll. For other uses, see Mushroom (disambiguation).
Mushroom
Released24 August 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceTroll
LocationTroll Stronghold
GenderMale
OptionsNone
ExamineHe's fast asleep.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID4144

Mushroom is a sleeping Mountain troll found just near the entrance to the Troll Stronghold. He currently seems to have no use in the game. There is a treasure trail clue which leads to coordinates just next to this troll. The player can hear a snoring sound if they stand near Mushroom.

Trolls are named after the first thing they eat or try to eat, so he must have eaten a mushroom.
